parameters.content:
## Fail Retry 
Important to retry on fail because if you are using any external storage, it will try to save at this time.
So you need to ensure success ...

## (1.0.24) Updates
* execution data

## Recommendations 
* Remember set timeout to 10 seconds

parameters.query:
SELECT messages.id as internal_id
FROM messages INNER JOIN conversations 
ON messages.conversation_id = conversations.id
WHERE messages.account_id = '{{ $json.extra.account }}' AND messages.source_id = '{{ $json.payload.source_id }}' ORDER BY messages.id DESC LIMIT 1;
